07-11-2024: - Fixed the following abilities changing their launch direction if the player snapped their camera quickly during the cast time: Ivy's Kudzu Bomb, Paradox's {AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20} Pulse Grenade, Warden's Alchemical Flask, Vindicta's Stake, Alchemical Fire (T3 Weapon item)
06-13-2024: - Updated effects to {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Fire|Size=20} Alchemical Fire to make it less noisy
05-30-2024: - Bullet Shield Health increased from +150 to +175
05-13-2024: - We are also nerfing {AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Fire|Size=20} Alchemical Fire. It now deals 40% less damage to non-heroes and the cooldown is increased from 25s to 37s.​
